front.title: SMTP Service Extension for Message Recall

abstract.t: End users occasionally send email messages that they later want torecall, perhaps because they sent incorrect information, or hadsecond thoughts about what they said in the message. Proprietaryemail systems often provide such a recall function. This documentspecifies a standard mechanism for providing it with Internet email.NoteA revised version of this draft document will be submitted to the RFCeditor as a Proposed Standard for the Internet Community. Discussionand suggestions for improvement are requested, and should be sent tomorg@ietf.org.
